republican.round_0: "I disagree, Sam. Securing our borders is crucial, but we can't ignore the fact that many undocumented immigrants are taking jobs from American citizens, straining our social services, and undermining our national identity. We need a fair and merit-based system to attract skilled workers, not open borders."
republican.round_1: "I understand where you're coming from, Emily, but we can't ignore the fact that many undocumented immigrants are taking advantage of our system. We need to prioritize fairness and accountability, rather than rewarding lawbreakers with a free pass to citizenship. A merit-based system would ensure that those who contribute to society do so through legitimate means."
